column4: wasn't there a way to save "bookmarks" for ssh? I thought so, but I just can't find a way
thats a good question i was wondering the same myself, thinking theonly solution was to save keys for hosts, but i would like some kind of bookmark functionality
I'm sure I've read something about saving bookmarks for ssh, like "ssh somebox"
i see i see, i never ended up finding any app for it, i shall look again
